content.content: This page links to the most up-to-date versions of various delegate resources. This thread and these links replace the individual threads previously posted and stickied in the delegates category.  General What is Delegation? - A Brief Overview of Delegation at Maker Delegation and MakerDAO - Initial introduction / announcement post that describes the delegate system at MakerDAO.  For Recognized Delegates Recognized Delegate Requirements - A list of Requirements that prospective recognized delegates should read and follow. Recognized Delegate Code of Conduct - A code of conduct to which recognized delegates must read and agree. Recognized Delegate Platform Template - A template that can optionally be used by a Recognized Delegate for their delegate platform.  For MKR Holders MKR Holder’s Guide to Delegation - A more indepth guide aimed at MKR Holders that explains the risks, benefits and key points of delegation. MKR Holders Agreement - The agreement to which MKR Holders implicitly agree when delegating their MKR to another party. Meet Your Delegate Meeting History - A list of the ‘Meet Your Delegate’ meetings held thus far.
content.GPT-summary: The post provides links to various delegate resources for MakerDAO, including a brief overview of delegation, requirements for recognized delegates, a code of conduct, a platform template, a guide for MKR holders, and a list of past meetings. The post does not fit neatly into any of the listed topics, but it is primarily informational and does not involve any feedback or collaboration.
GPT-discussion-categories: This is not a discussion, but the proposal itself
